argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | opelopab.1 | |- A e. _V |
| 2 |  | opelopab.2 | |- B e. _V |
| 3 |  | opelopab.3 | |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) |
| 4 |  | opelopab.4 | |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_opelopabg | |- ( ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V ) -> ( <. A , B >. e. { <. x , y >. | ph } <-> ch ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 5 | #P_mp2an | |- ( <. A , B >. e. { <. x , y >. | ph } <-> ch ) |
